sellerCard.oneLiner: WordPress Web Design and Development Studio Crafting Unique Websites
sellerCard.description:
Hey!

We are Hexweb, a web design & development agency based in Bulgaria, Europe.

üìå Specialized in WordPress, we‚Äôve been on Fiverr since 2018 with nearly 500 successful projects across various industries. We collaborate with businesses worldwide and partner with agencies across North America and Europe.

üåç We speak English, German, Bulgarian, and some Russian and have experience with multilingual projects beyond these languages.

üí° One thing to know about us?
We like to get things done‚Äîefficiently, professionally, and with long-term success in mind. üöÄ

description.content:
Hi, I'm Svet!


I lead the Hexweb team, specializing in WordPress web design & development.

We are here to develop, design, or revamp an amazing WordPress website tailored to your business needs. With 450+ completed projects on Fiverr and a 100% customer satisfaction rate, we create professional, high-performing websites that help your business grow and succeed.


What We Can Build for You:

  • Business Websites
  • E-Commerce & Marketplaces
  • Membership & Affiliate Platforms
  • Landing Pages
  • Booking & Listing Websites


Portfolio: bit.ly/hexweb-p


What You Get:


  • Clean, Modern & Responsive Design
  • Basic SEO & Speed Optimization
  • Security & Performance Improvement
  • On-Time Delivery & Revisions
  • 30 Days of Free Support
  • Video Tutorials on Demand
  • Hosting Setup & Guidance *
  • Easy-to-Manage WordPress CMS so you can update content effortlessly.


How to Choose a Package?

Our packages serve as guidelines - check the FAQ or message us to find the best fit for your project.


Why Choose Us?

We are professionals who prioritize quality, long-term business relationships, and results-driven websites.


Contact us today & let's bring your vision to life!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why the Project Brief is so importnat ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
A project brief ensures clear expectations and smooth collaboration. 

It helps:
‚úî Align both parties on goals & requirements
‚úî Avoid misunderstandings before & during development
‚úî Speed up the process by reducing unnecessary back-and-forth discussions

questionsAndAnswers.question: Revision Policy
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Revisions cover small corrections based on the original project requirements (our inaccuracies). Minor tweaks that require minimal time and effort are included. However, new features, changes beyond the initial scope, or additional requirements are considered extra work and may incur additional char

questionsAndAnswers.question: How to Choose the Right Package ‚Äì StartUp?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: This package is ideal for simple one-page websites or landing pages with 3-4 sections. However, not all one-page websites are simple‚Äîcomplex features or advanced functionalities can affect the price. If your project requires custom integrations or dynamic elements, feel free to reach out for estimat

questionsAndAnswers.question: How to Choose the Right Package ‚Äì Pro Website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: This package is ideal for business and informational websites with 3-5 pages (e.g., Home, About, Services, Contact). It includes standard functionality like contact forms but no advanced features. Adding more pages or extra functionalities (e.g., booking systems, events, e-commerce) may affect quote

questionsAndAnswers.question: How to Choose the Right Package ‚Äì E-commerce / WebApp?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: This package is designed for eCommerce websites and complex web applications with features like payments, bookings, memberships, user dashboards, and more. It's ideal for highly custom projects requiring advanced functionality. The final price depends on the scope, complexity, integrations needed

questionsAndAnswers.question: What‚Äôs Included in Your Packages? What About Hosting, Domain & Logo?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
Our packages include:
‚úî Web Design & Development
‚úî Stock images, icons, and graphics
‚úî Basic SEO & Speed Optimization
‚úî Hosting Setup & Configuration
‚úî 30 Days of Free Support (Bug Fixes & Updates)
‚úî Video Tutorials on Demand

We are partners with SiteGround and can recommend their services.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is It Easy to Manage a WordPress Website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
Yes, WordPress is very user-friendly, and we will guide you through your first steps. We‚Äôll teach you the essential tools and features, so you feel confident managing your site.

With over 43% of all websites worldwide powered by WordPress, it‚Äôs the most popular and flexible CMS available.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do You Offer Support After the Project Ends? What‚Äôs Included?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
Yes! We provide 30 days of free support with every project, covering:
‚úî General maintenance & updates
‚úî Bug fixes & minor changes (see Revision Policy)
‚úî Video tutorials on demand

We also offer long-term maintenance plans for ongoing support. A separate support agreement is provided for clarity.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What Does Basic SEO Include?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
Our Basic SEO package provides essential optimizations to improve your website‚Äôs visibility:
‚úî Meta Tags & Descriptions
‚úî H1-H6 Heading Structure
‚úî Image Alt Tags
‚úî Sitemap.xml & Robots.txt
‚úî Google Analytics Integration
While this won‚Äôt guarantee a #1 ranking on Google, it creates a strong foundat

questionsAndAnswers.question: What Do You Need to Get Started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
To begin, we‚Äôll need:
‚úî Project brief ‚Äì Main idea & specific details
‚úî Logo & images
‚úî Website content (text, pages, etc.)
‚úî WordPress login details (if applicable)

If you're missing anything, just contact us‚Äîwe‚Äôll guide you through the process and help with everything needed!

reviews.comment: Thank you for creating the website in such a short time! The team did a phenomenal job, maintaining excellent communication and being incredibly accommodating throughout the process.

seller_response.comment: Collaborating with Kumar on the St. Hughs Collage project was a real pleasure. Thank you for your trust.
It was a pleasure for me to work with Jonas and Culinarium Atmosphere. Great project, with amazing people. I wish you great success.

reviews.comment: my experience was exceeded. All my wishes and even special requests were catered for at no extra cost. i am convinced by ARbeti and can recommend them 100%. This was not the last time we worked together.

seller_response.comment: It was a real pleasure to collaborate with Fabian. Thank you for your trust :)

reviews.comment: Hexweb did an AMAZING job with my website! Their professionalism and attention to detail truly exceeded my expectations. Working with them was a breeze, thanks to their proactive communication and deep understanding of my needs. üëç

seller_response.comment: It was a great experience. Thank you for your trust

reviews.comment: Hexweb is very reliable to work with especially regards to their delivery times

seller_response.comment: A real pleasure to collaborate once again, thanks for your trust.

reviews_snippet.comment: Svet developed a website for us in WordPress. He was excellent to work with and we highly recommend him.  He communicated well, listened to our requests, and carried them out or suggested better alternatives. Svet was diligent about meeting our timelines. We greatly appreciated Svet's high level of skill and we are very, very pleased with the results of his work!

I worked with Svetoslav to develop a website for my startup, and he exceeded all expectations! The quality of the website he delivered is outstanding, showcasing not only his attention to detail but also his flair for innovative design. Svetoslav was highly responsive throughout the project, always available to answer questions and provide updates. What truly set him apart was his willingness to go above and beyond. He offered creative solutions that enhanced our web presence significantly. I highly recommend Svetoslav for anyone looking for top-notch web development services!

Svet is super talented! His attention to detail is excellent. His communication skills and responsiveness are excellent. He is an absolute pleasure to work with! He created a multi-layered website for me to combine my salon, my photography, and my hair product businesses. He also created e-commerce functionality for online sales. I'm super happy and would highly recommend Svet!

I couldn't be more delighted with Svetoslav. His exceptional website creation skills were amazing. They not only met but exceeded all criteria, crafting a visually stunning and flawlessly functional website. I wholeheartedly recommend him for an outstanding website development experience.
Svetoslav did a great job with the dev. He is tech expert and goes over and beyond to resolve technical issues . I highly recommend working with him and I look forward to working with him again.
